text.autoconfig.debrand.title: Debrand Configuration
text.autoconfig.debrand.option.windowTit: If enabled, adds an asterisk to the window's title.
text.autoconfig.debrand.option.titleScre: If enabled, adds indication to the bottom-left corner of the title screen.
text.autoconfig.debrand.option.debugMenu: If enabled, shows the client brand in the debug menu.
